description: Slate Steele has got a body chiseled out of granite, but don't let that fool you into thinking he's all brawn and no brain. When he's not at the flexing his weight, this LA gym-rat pounds the books, beefing up on knowledge to complement his impressive physique. We catch up with Slate alone in the gym, putting in the necessary work it takes to maintain such a perfect body. After his workout, he decides to let off some steam and show off a bit as well, stripping down to his jock and peeling that away as well, as he leans on the bench and runs his fingers over the veins of his cock, teasing the head and fondling his balls. Pushing his hardened cock down, he lets go and it snaps back against his stomach, before he grabs it and repeats the process. Finally he's done teasing and gets to the business at hand, working his shaft up and down until he's ready to unleash his load, which he explodes all over the gym floor in small white puddles of goo. </br></br>Enjoy!
title: Slate Steele
